mapper.select: SELECT b.qna_board_seq, b.qna_board_name, b.qna_board_wdate, m.mem_id, CASE WHEN b.qna_board_status = 0 THEN '삭제' WHEN b.qna_board_status = 1 THEN '게시' WHEN b.qna_board_status = 2 THEN '관리자삭제' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS qna_board_status_text FROM tb_qna_board AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS m ON b.mem_seq = m.mem_seq WHERE m.mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') ORDER BY b.qna_board_seq DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10;

SELECT b.qna_board_seq, b.qna_board_name, b.qna_board_contents, b.qna_board_wdate, m.mem_id, m.mem_img FROM tb_qna_board AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS m ON b.mem_seq = m.mem_seq WHERE b.qna_board_seq=#{qna_board_seq}

SELECT c.qna_cmt_seq, c.qna_cmt_contents, c.qna_cmt_wdate, c.qna_cmt_status, c.mem_seq, m.mem_id, CASE WHEN c.qna_cmt_status = 0 THEN '삭제' WHEN c.qna_cmt_status = 1 THEN '게시' WHEN c.qna_cmt_status = 2 THEN '관리자삭제' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS qna_cmt_status_text FROM tb_qna_comment AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS m ON c.mem_seq = m.mem_seq WHERE m.mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') ORDER BY c.qna_cmt_seq DESC limit #{start}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_qna_board AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS m ON b.mem_seq = m.mem_seq WHERE m.mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_qna_comment b LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS m ON b.mem_seq = m.mem_seq WHERE m.mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
SELECT qna_board_file_name FROM tb_qna_board_file WHERE qna_board_seq = #{qna_board_seq}
